Package arcade.sim.profiler

Class Profiler

java.lang.Object
arcade.sim.profiler.Profiler
All Implemented Interfaces:
java.io.Serializable, sim.engine.Steppable
Direct Known Subclasses:
GrowthProfiler, ParameterProfiler
public abstract class Profiler
extends java.lang.Object
implements sim.engine.Steppable
A Profiler object captures simulation data and writes to a JSON file.

More than one Profiler can be scheduled for a given Simulation. When using write, the file will be created (including any directories) if it does not exist. If the file already exists, contents will be appended to the contents of the file (rather than overwriting the file).

Since:
2.3
Version:
2.3.0
See Also:
Serialized Form

  • Method Details

    • scheduleProfiler

      public abstract void scheduleProfiler​(Simulation sim, Series series, java.lang.String seed)
      Adds the Profiler to the simulation schedule.
      Parameters:
      sim - the simulation instance
      series - the current simulation series
      seed - the random number generator seed

    • saveProfile

      public abstract void saveProfile​(sim.engine.SimState state, Series series, int seed)
      Saves the Profiler to a file.
      Parameters:
      state - the MASON simulation state
      series - the current simulation series
      seed - the random number generator seed

    • write

      static void write​(java.lang.String json, java.lang.String path)
      Writes the JSON object to a file.

      Paths that do not exist will be created. If the file already exists, output will be appended.

      Parameters:
      json - the combined output JSON file
      path - the path to write the file
